name: Alberta Approved Farmers' Markets
description: This study includes data related to information about the Alberta Approved Farmers' Market Program. It includes the original .csv file from the Government of Alberta Open Data website. Also included is a shapefile that can be used in Geographic Information System (GIS) software.

distribution.name: AB_FM_2015_WGS84.zip
distribution.description: The zip file contains a .shp file (for use in GIS software) of Farmers Market locations in Alberta.

distribution.name: farmersmarkets.csv
distribution.description: This is the original .csv file that was downloaded from the Government of Alberta Open Data website.
